How to buy crypto on Changelly

07 Mar 2019 - Will

A better way to buy into crypto is to use changelly, you can buy with a credit card or even a gift cards. Head over to this link changelly.com/exchange/ to take a look or buy some



Click on "Exchange" or on the link to buy "Bitcoin with Credit Card"



Make sure you enter your correct address, there's no going back if you send someone else your new crypto.
Click on next and then enter your billing/payment info




Disclaimer: This is not financial advice, it's your responsibility. This is ONLY a guide to learn how to buy or use crypto currencies, they are very volitile and may not be a safe store of value
